name: OMGear Waterproof Dry Bag Backpack Phone Pouch 40L/30L/20L/10L/5L Floating Dry Sack for Kayaking Boating Outdoors Activities
short_description: Premium thick materials,100%waterproof: OMGear dry bag is made by rugged 500D PVC tarpaulin , vinyl-coated for waterproof protection.Waterproof phone pouch is made by quality ABS+PVC with reinforced entry.You smart phone can trust our waterproof phone pouch

Strong Shoulder Straps :OMGear waterproof dry backpack is with strong adjustable back shoulder straps,allows for comfortable carrying and fit for most body sizes.For 30Liter and 40Liter waterproof backpack,we make the straps by durable EVA,softy and more durable for heavy use

Must Haves for Most Outdoors Activities:The dry backpack can float on water after rolled and buckled,perfect for all outdoors activities,like diving;kayaking;boating;paddling board; sailing;canoeing;surfing;fishing;rafting;hiking;camping;beach activities ect

Easy To Use And Clean : Just put your gear in your OMGear water tight dry bags, grab top woven tape and roll down tightly 3 to 5 times and then plug buckle to complete seal. The Dry bag is easy to wipe clean due to its smooth surface

Roll Up Design: OMGear dry bag needs to roll up 3-5 times and please ensure that the dry bag is inflated after rolling up.If the dry bag is inflated,which means air can not leak out from dry bag,which means water also can not leak in

name: VILLEY Dry Bag Waterproof 5L Roll Top Sack Keeps Gear Dry Lightweight Sack for Kayaking Boating Camping Swimming and Beach Adventures Red Camo
short_description: Premium Material: The VILLEY dry bag is made from durable 500D PVC with a cold-pressed, waterproof construction. This high-quality material is wear-resistant, tear-proof, and puncture-proof, ensuring reliable protection in any environment.

Easy to Carry: Each bag includes an adjustable strap for hassle-free carrying. The 5L and 10L sizes come with a single strap for hand-carrying, over-the-shoulder, or crossbody wear, while the 20L size features two straps for backpack-style carrying. Designed for comfort, the extra-long straps are fully adjustable.

Durable & Tear-Resistant: From trekking through the wilderness to paddling through rapids, this bag is built to endure. Whether you're hiking, kayaking, or camping in the rain, the rugged construction withstands wear and tear, keeping your gear safe and dry.

Easy to Use & Quick Storage: Roll the top down 3–5 times, buckle it shut, and you're good to go! The airtight seal ensures full waterproof protection. Plus, the smooth PVC surface makes it easy to clean—just wipe it down with a damp cloth. When not in use, simply fold it down for compact storage in your backpack or luggage.

Versatile for Every Adventure: Perfect for storing electronics, clothes, snacks, or emergency gear—whether you're on land or water, your essentials stay dry and secure. Great for kayaking, paddleboarding, beach trips, hiking, camping, and more.

name: ALVABABY 2pcs Cloth Diaper Wet Dry Bags Waterproof Reusable with Two Zippered Pockets Travel Beach Pool Daycare Soiled Baby Items Yoga Gym Bag for Swimsuits or Wet Clothes L2933
short_description: Fashion , Reusable&Waterproof , Durability －A trim and attractive design. ALVABABY wet/dry bag are made from waterproof 100% polyester, put dirty cloth diapers in a wet bag. Comes with handle for easy carrying or attaching to your diaper bag or stroller.
Longevity Zippered － TWO Zippered compartments for keep wet and dry things separate. Each bag contains a "wet" section that is sewn and sealed for no wicking or leaking.
Enough Space－30cm x 36cm (approx.:11.5 in x 14.5 in)，Holds approximately 5-7 cloth diapers. Light weight, easy to carry (less than 50 g).

Multi-functional Bags－A truly wonderful bag that allows you to carry your wet and dry items in the same bag. Carry all your items in one bag while keeping your dry items dry and your wet or soiled items separate. Truly an all in one bag! They can be used as diaper wet dry bags,travel bags,storage bags,cosmetic bags,handbags,wash bag,organizer bags.

Love Your Life, Love This Bag - If you are an environmentalist who loves nature, then this handbag is tailored for you. Except for the metal zipper, all materials of this bag are made of friendly materials, which are lightweight, comfortable.

name: HEETA 2/3/4 Pack Waterproof Pouch with Waist Strap, Screen Touchable Dry Bag with Adjustable Belt for Phone Valuables for Kayaking, Swimming, Snorkeling, Boating, Fishing, Surfing & Beach
short_description: PVC

IP68 Waterproof - Triple sealing protection with 3 zipper locks and a fold Velcro over top, IPX8 lab-certified up to 32 feet (10 meters) underwater for one hour, protect your cellphone and money from water, dirt, dust, and mud, suitable for many water activities like swimming, boating, surfing, diving, kayaking, etc

Large Capacity & Adjustable Waist Strap - The waterproof pouch has enough space to hold your phone, passport, keys and other personal items. The waist strap is adjustable (22-33 in) and long enough to wear comfortably, suitable for men, women, girls and boys. Waist Size Range: 32.6-44.1 in (including the length of the pouch)
Durable & Lightweight - Made of high-quality PVC material, hard to be scratched by sharp stones or branches. Only 3.4 Oz, enjoy your vacation without any burden

Screen Touchable - The colorful & transparent waterproof pouch is designed to be able to use your cellphone as normal when you are out of water. It's able to text and glance over the info without taking your phone out of the pouch expect BLACK one. Black one is opaque and private to protect your valuables
Many Choices - 19 combinations of different colors to choose, a good choice for the gift to women and men

name: Pelican Marine IP68 Waterproof Dry Bag 2L - Roll Top Waterproof Backpack w/ Phone Case/Pouch - Boating & Kayak Accessories - Essentials for Camping Swimming Beach Fishing Rafting Travel - Black/Yellow
short_description: IP68 Certified Waterproof: With excellent water-resistant seal performance (IP68 rating), this 100% sealed waterproof bag provides comprehensive protection for your phone and other belongings in a variety of environments; The waterproof roll-top closure ensures a perfect seal and keeps out water, snow, dust, sand, and dirt

Multifunctional Outdoor Usage: This multifunctional dry bag is perfect for outdoor activities such as camping, kayaking, boating, rafting, hiking, swimming, and fishing; Take it with you to the lake, beach, or on a jet ski for reliable protection against water, sand, and dirt; The buckle and D-rings are made with upgraded POM material, making them stronger and more durable for frequent use

Reliable Protection: Our Waterproof Marine Series dry bags offer reliable protection for even the most rugged users; They are built to last for years and provide water-resistant protection; The designated waterproof compartment is made of high-quality material and allows easy storage and carrying of your phone (up to 7" screen in diagonal size); With designated touch screen access to your phone, you can even check messages or emails without removing your phone, making it easy to stay connected and protected

Adjustable Shoulder Strap: Carry your dry storage bag with ease using the detachable and adjustable shoulder strap; You can wear it like a backpack or cross it over your chest for hands-free hiking and adventures; The bag also includes a D-ring (keychain) for easy attachment to a kayak, canoe, backpack, or boat
Package Contents: 1 Unit of 2L Pelican Waterproof Dry Bag - Marine Series Black / Hi-Vis Yellow plus (1) Detachable Keychain Lanyard; 1-Year Warranty

name: Dry Sack/Floating Waterproof Bag 2L/5L/10L/20L/30L for Boating, Kayaking, Hiking, Snowboarding, Camping, Rafting, Fishing and Backpacking
short_description: AMAZON_NA
2L size, capacity: 122Cu.In, super ligh-tweight dry sack - Crafted with ultimate lightweight & waterproof 250D PVC cloth, only weights 3.1oz. Never deal with heavy or stiff dry bags again!
Rugged roll-top closure - Seals quickly and easily with 3 roll closure, which is twice as safe as any closure seal available on market.
A snap hook on the quick-release buckle provides a handy attachment point.
Super easy to seal - Fold the top at least three times, then snap the buckle shut.

Keeps your accessories dry while rafting, boating, kayaking, hiking, snowboarding, camping, fishing, canoeing and backpacking.[Caution: Please keep the dry bag inflated so that it can float on the water to avoid water soaking into the sealing part]

name: Waterproof Phone Pouch Bag Case for iPhone 16 15 14 Pro Max Galaxy S24 S23 Ultra Cellphone Water Protector Pouch | Up to 10", Large, 2 Pack, IPX8, Beach Essentials, Travel Must Haves
short_description: 【IPX8 Waterproof Certified】- Rynapac's three-layer lock-down technology ensures certified IPX8 waterproofing, delivering comprehensive protection for your 10 inch large waterproof phone pouch against water, snow, dust, and sand. Keep valuables such as passports, bank cards, cruise cards, cash, ID cards and your cell phone in a waterproof cell phone pouch at the same time to keep them completely dry. Easy to use/carry

【Cruise Essentials 2025】- Rynapac phone water protector pouch is specially designed for outdoor activities such as beach vacation, cruise ship, fishing, swimming in pools, sailing, skiing, boating, kayaking, snorkeling, tubing, rafting, and other waterpark activities, so that you can keep your device away from water, dust, and snow, and enjoy life to the fullest (Do not store sharp objects with this beach accessory for vacation. Avoid exposure to the sun to prevent the phone from overheating and shutting down automatically)

【Beach Vacation Essentials】- This phone waterproof pouch is divided into 2 layers, the inner semi-sealed area is used to store cash/ID/keys/room card, and the outer layer is used to store the cell phone, and it's made of PVC material, which enables smooth touch screen operation and Face verification is available, allowing you to text and browse messages without taking out your phone, bringing more convenience to your life

【Summer Travel Accessories】- 10 inches large-capacity design for this waterproof phone bag has enough space, universal cell phone models for iPhone 16 15 14 13 Pro Max, Galaxy S25 S24 S23 S22 Ultra, Pixel 8 7 Pro, and it can carry any protective case, effectively preventing accidental drops and scratches, and Giving your phone full protection

【Ultra Clear Photography】- The water proof phone pouch iphone not only keeps your device safe but also ensures your photos remain strikingly clear. Whether you're snorkeling in the ocean or taking a beach selfie, the pouch's transparency guarantees you capture underwater moments with ease and incredible detail. Say farewell to blurry shots and embrace crystal-clear underwater photography with this cell phone waterproof pouch (Hydraulic pressure under certain water depths would impact the operation of the mobile phone touchscreen, Please take photos by volume buttons, it is recommended to dive for no more than 15 minutes)

【Warm Reminder】- This water proof cell phone case for beach comes with a durable black lanyard that can be slung across the body for easy carrying, the lanyard is two snap-on for easy removal. (Read the precautions carefully before using the waterproof pouch. Test the waterproof function with a paper towel before each use, squeeze air before sealing, and submerge in water for about 10 minutes. Please remove objects under the top mount to avoid water entering the enclosure)

name: Piscifun Dry Bag Waterproof, Lightweight Dry Backpack with Waist Pouch and Phone Case for Kayaking, Boating 10L 20L 30L
short_description: Waterproof Material: The finely manufactured 500D nylon material offers superior waterproofing and durability. The Piscifun Waterproof backpack is perfect for keeping your clothes, cameras, aircraft, and more

Dry & Wet Depart Design: The innovative design of dry and wet compartments makes storage easy. It's recommended to place wet clothes or towels into the front zippered bag, while other dry belongings go in the main waterproof bag

Comfortable & Breathable: Featuring soft material, a breathable shoulder strap, and ergonomic design. When you put on this Piscifun Dry bag, you'll experience how comfortable it is. This bag is the perfect accessory for your journey

Extra Gifts: Enjoy additional bonuses like a water-resistant portable backpack, a waterproof pouch, and an IPX8 waterproof mobile phone case. The phone case features a high-definition window and a secure 100% seal lock. The portable backpack can be used not only to pack your dry bag but also as a standalone item

Multi-scene & Multi-choice: Keep your belongings safe and dry for various activities such as kayaking, fishing, surfing, boating, camping, rafting, hiking, canoe trips, etc. The LT waterproof backpack is available in 4 colors and 4 sizes. Choose your favorite style!

name: Skog Å Kust DrySak - Roll Top Waterproof Bag for Travel & Outdoors - 5, 10 & 20 Liter sizes
short_description: Waterproof Protection: Keeps your gear safe and dry in any wet environment - ideal for kayaking, boating, fishing, swimming, or beach trips.
Durable and Rugged Construction: Made from heavy-duty, puncture-resistant material for long-lasting performance - withstands the rigors of outdoor adventures.
Easy to Use Roll-Top Closure: Quickly and securely seals the bag, preventing water from entering - simple to operate even with wet hands.

Convenient Splash-Proof Exterior Pocket: Features an exterior splash-proof pocket for easy access to essential items like phones, keys, or wallets - keeps them within reach without compromising the bag's waterproof seal.
Versatile and Multi-Purpose: Perfect for a variety of activities - use it as a kayaking dry bag, boating dry bag, hiking dry bag, or travel dry bag.

name: HEETA Waterproof Dry Bag for Women Men(Upgraded Version) 5L/10L/20L/30L/40L Roll Top Lightweight Dry Storage Bag Backpack with Emergency Whistle for Travel, Swimming, Boating, Kayaking, Camping, Beach
short_description: Waterproof - Made with professional seamless technology, our dry bag has the overall waterproof capability, making sure to keep your items and valuables dry when you do some water sports like boating, kayaking, surfing, rafting (but not underwater sports).
Durable - Made of 0.02 in (0.5 mm) thick upgraded wear-resistant PVC material, it's suitable for all kinds of outdoor activities. Waterproof bag is well adapted to various weather and environment.

Multifunctional - Equipped with adjustable shoulder straps for shoulder carrying and backpack, our dry bag is very convenient for different occasions like boating, rafting, kayaking, hiking, camping, fishing, mountaineering, etc. The lightweight dry bag won't weigh down your arms or shoulders.

Adjustable - 5L/10L comes with an adjustable and removable shoulder strap for cross-body style. 20L/30L/40L comes with two adjustable shoulder straps for backpack-style carrying and one side handle for hand-carrying, very convenient for your on-the-go.

Multiple Choice - 5 Sizes (5L/10L/20L/30L/40L) and 10 colors (blue, black, orange, rose red, pitch green, dark green, lemon green, flower, camouflage, new camouflage) to choose, a right choice of gift for women and men. Each bag comes with a free emergency whistle, bringing comprehensive protection for your safe travel.
